entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
